alert.note: Alert for Granville; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Person and northwestern Granville Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leasburg, or 8 miles west of Roxboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Bushy Fork, Hyco Lake, Moriah, Hyco Marina, Surl and Mayo Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
